page.title: 05LAW AND ORDER
page.content: In the Pelton area there is a lot of petty crime. At least 700 people are arrested through the local Pelton office in one year. The Policemen do like working in this area. In the station are based 12 Policemen and 2 Sergeants who work 24 hour cover. In this area the main crimes are house burglaries and thefts. The station was built in 1983. The criminals are all ages. Our local Sergeant has been in the Force for 26 years during which time he has seen an increased crime rate. The average rate is 55 people convicted per month. The station has got 2 cars and though it is not always open, there is always cover from the nearest large office. This office has only 1 holding cell, 1 interview room and the usual accommodation for staff to work and relax.
